■After Q-ing, wait 8m for it to
cool before assembling it in the
McGriddle.
■The McGriddle's pre-Q-ing can be
used for up to 3 servings (6 pcs) 
in the large Q-ing container.

■You can run additional
pre-Q-ing during the breakfast
service as needed.
■To maintain quality, don't
run Q-ing any more than the
full run size.
